graph_title: People from the university community participating in initiatives/campaigns to promote a healthy lifestyle (sports, nutrition, prevention, training)
indicator_name: People from the university community participating in initiatives/campaigns to promote a healthy lifestyle (sports, nutrition, prevention, training)
SDG_GOAL: End hunger, achieve food security and improved nutrition and promote sustainable agriculture
SDG_TARGET: By 2030, end all forms of malnutrition, including achieving, by 2025, the internationally agreed targets on stunting and wasting in children under 5 years of age, and address the nutritional needs of adolescent girls, pregnant and lactating women and older persons
SDG_INDICATOR: People from the university community participating in initiatives/campaigns to promote a healthy lifestyle (sports, nutrition, prevention, training)
